condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Community development guidelinesdeveloped and furnished to IDA forreview. | Description :Community developmentguidelinesdeveloped and furnished to IDA forreview. | Due Date :31-Mar-2014
Finance Agreement :Hiring of a Project Coordinator, aFinancial Management Specialist, anAccountan | Description :Establishing aProject Management Team hired competitively | Due Date :07-Mar-2012

Finance Agreement :Institutional plan for sustainability developed & furnished to IDA forcomment. | Description :Institutionalplan for sustainability developed and furnished to IDA forcomment (and thereafter to beimplemented taking into accountIDA‘scomments). | Due Date :31-Mar-2014
Finance Agreement :Project Manual adopted | Description :Adoption of the manual of procedures | Due Date :07-Mar-2012
Finance Agreement :Recruitment of an external audit firm. | Description :Recruitment of an external audit firm. | Due Date:31-Dec-2012

Finance Agreement :Sector environmental and social assessment carried out. | Description :SESA carried out and recommendations,together with action plan based on the recommendations furnished to IDA for review (thereafter, action plan agreed with IDA to becarried out). | Due Date :31-Mar-2013
Finance Agreement :Steering Committee Established | Description :Setting up of a Steering Committee | Due Date :07-Mar-2012
Finance Agreement :Subsidiary Agreement between theRecipient and BUMIGEB to beconcluded. | Description :Subsidiary Agreementbetween theRecipient and BUMIGEB to beconcluded. | Due Date :07-Mar-2012

title.narrative: Number of exploration sites inspections commissioned by the Geology Office

ASM and mining communities sensitization and training on mining environmental matters
Number of people trained in the implementation of environmental legislation regarding mining operations
Average number of days to process a mineral license application
Number of geological sheets covered by geo data acquisition
Percentage of industrial mines covered by annual tax controls
Percentage of industrial mining operations covered by annual technical inspection
Percentage of industrial mining operations covered by environmental inspection
Number of advanced exploration projects controlled financially
Geo-data database (GIS) integrating geological, geophysical and geo-chemical information accessible in the public domain
Ministry of Mines Communication strategy developed and implemented
National Framework for local content developed
National guidelines on mining community development developed
Updated and modernized mineral cadastre with accessible information on line
Number of civil servants trained including women
Annual graduation rate recorded at the School of Mines of Fada
